title: It's about toxic players just join in the room
body:
This guy is so toxic that after the game everyone reported him. he got sent to the tribunal... what exactly does that do. i have him on my friends list but he doesn't know it and i keeps sending me messages like 

" have fun with sucking your own **** all day"  

"lick my gooch ****"  (what is a gooch?) 

"get **** out your own *******
fggtttttt
LICK MY ****"

yea i'm not making this up so i was just curious on what the "tribunal" actually does and was wondering if i can put his name up here but then i realise its under the TC that im not allowed to so idk what im rly suppose to do

replies.body: Screw the name and shame policy everyone is just about over it now

SHUT UP
WE DONT NEED '' IM SO IMPORTANT''
DUDES LIKE YOU

TYPING FASTLY AND BREATHING LOUDLY LIKE A HAIRY BEAR WITH YOUR SINGLET ACTING SHIT

WRITING ON THE BOARDS COZ U THINK UR TOP SHIT

COMPLAINING ABOUT SHIT AND NOT GROWING UP

I feel like ur under age cause of ur name but yea tots I came to the boards bcause im the coolest kid in school not because I have an actual question...u got me buddy im busted mmhh ur the cool kid not me im just on the baords to seek attention man im so sry I offended u

You're right in that there's a no name and shame policy here on the boards. If you've reported him for his language, next step is to block and remove him from your friends list, no need to keep toxicity around! He will be punished if he keeps up this toxicity and players continue to report him.
